EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Avaloq - 2014.11.12.Email - Follow Up - Attendees
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending our Webinar: Successful Test Automation using Tosca for Avaloq
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Successful Test Automation for Avaloq at LGT
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Thank you for taking the time to join our webinar “Successful Test Automation using Tosca for Avaloq”, where we talked about leveraging Tricentis Tosca Testsuite for Avaloq testing in LGT Group to optimize risk coverage and time to market. We hope you enjoyed the webinar and will be able to apply what you’ve learned in your daily business. Your active participation and engaging questions helped to make the webinar lively and interesting.
Check out www.tricentis.com/resources/webcasts <http://www.tricentis.com/resources/webcasts> for the recording of this and other webinars. Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Martin Lanzerstorfer IT Business Professional LGT Financial Services AG
Helmut Stueber Managing Consultant Tricentis
